name: CONTESTANTS
description:
This game is a multiplayer PvP and Coop-Zombie shooter and Zombie-mode can also be played alone. The PvP can be played maximum with 20 vs. 20 players and your goal is to stay at the objectives. The playarea consists of a labyrinth which is different every single game. Multiplayer just works with Steam (must be opened in the background) or LAN if you enter the IP-Adress.

The team which holds the objectives longer will know where the exit is before the whole labyrinth will be flooded. The team with most surviving players will win the game.

Play the Tutorial in order to know how to play the game!

Let yourself be surprised ;-)
